Why thus Lenovo does not belong to phone category?

As of yet we do not have any guides for Lenovo phones! We're adding a category now, thanks for the suggestion! If you have a Lenovo device that you're reparing, consider documenting it and sharing it with the iFixit community!  Thanks for the heads up.

title: Access MY Accounts?!
comment: Why does it need to be able to add, delete, or edit my phone accounts? It doesn't!!!

In the 2.5 release, we added a feature to keeps guides offline, which requires using Androids account manager.  We only need to add, delete and edit your iFixit account.  We do not access or modify any of your other accounts - your privacy is our top priority! The app source code can be viewed at https://github.com/iFixit/iFixitAndroid

title: Create accounts and change passwords?
comment: Great app,  but I'm I uninstalling it now that it wants permission to create accounts and change passwords. At the very least, that requires extreme justification.

Our recent release includes syncing and saving guides offline so you can use them without internet access, Android requires these permsisions to achieve this.  We only create and modify your iFixit.com account; we do not touch any other accounts or passwords.  You can see the source code here (https://github.com/iFixit/iFixitAndroid/pull/200/files)

title: No support
comment: For Ford Fusion.

We're in the process of expanding our Auto guides.  iFixit is a community based wiki, like Wikipedia for repair manuals, so unfortunatly we don't have everything quite yet, but we're working towards having repair manuals for everything, for free - but we need help! http://www.ifixit.com/Device/Ford_Automobile
exellenT...

title: Needs more content
comment: Idea is good, but very poor content. Tested diferent categorys, but didn't find nothing about i need (nothing from ~ 15 searches!)

iFixit is a free, community based wiki for repair manuals, so if you have something you'd like to see guides for, you can add them yourself - the help would be much appreciated! http://www.ifixit.com/Contribute  Otherwise, you can post up on http://meta.ifixit.com/ and request guides you'd like to see.

title: Warning

We do not and will not use your camera without your permssion. Period. You don't need to take my word for it though - the app is 100% open source (https://github.com/ifixit/ifixitandroid). Feel free to email us at apps@dozuki.com if you have further concerns!
